section.title: Configuration
section.para:
You have to enable both plugins and to publish:
a site login module (if you want to login on the public site using external login servers).
an admin login module in the login position (if you want to login on the administrator site using external login servers).
You have to install some External Login Plugins such the CAS server plugin to be able to create external login servers. The parameters common to all external login servers are:
Title
The server title. It must be unique.
Status
The server status.
Auto-register
Set true to auto-register new users.
Auto-update
Set true to auto-update users.
Default user group
The default user group users belong to.
